name: Play Dead! #3 - Fangs Fr Th Mmrs
name_original: Play Dead! #3 - Fangs Fr Th Mmrs
description:
A  story about a band, and their strange life on the road accompanied by a surprisingly lively dead dog.

FEATURES:

  • Dozens of unique, hand-drawn backgrounds and CGs
  • Full voice-acting!
  • An episodic story released in small, bite-sized chapters
  • Four (4) dumb musicians
  • Scratch that, ten (10) musicians and one nonbinary merch vendor
  • A very good (ghost) boy
  • Vampires, maybe?
  • Snarky references to all your favorite mid-2000s emo bands
This is Chapter 3 of the story! If you haven't read the others, you might want to start with Chapter 1.

VOICE CAST:

  • Josh Portillo as Corey
  • Allen Chan as Kaleb
  • Jazzy Oliver as Brian
  • Rebecca Chiara Marano as Savannah & the Guard
  • Ryan Hoyle as Blair
  • Jerron Bacat as Mitch
  • Elissa Park as Sidney

NOTES & WARNINGS:

Content warning for profanity, alcohol use, blood (?) and one semi-shirtless singer.

This is a kinetic novel, so there are no plot-altering choices or alternate endings to unlock. Grab some popcorn, sit back, and enjoy the story.

This is intended to be a comedic supernatural/horror story, and for the most part, isn't all that much scarier than your average episode of Scooby-Doo. For the most part.

---

Dear Streamers: If you'd like to stream this game, you are more than welcome to (in fact, I'd love a link to it)! However, do keep in mind that it's geared towards older teen and adult audiences, and make note of the content warnings (there is a fair amount of cursing.)
